Sentencas: The hydrogen oxidation reaction mechanism at Nickel/Yttria-stabilised Zirconia (Ni/YSZ) anode of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is investigated using the reaction route (RR) graph method.
Titulo: Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The corresponding RR graph is constructed and reduced by exploiting its analogy with electrical resistive circuits.
Titulo: Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An analytical expression for the overall reaction rate is derived and compared satisfactorily with the conventional quasi steady state (QSS) methodology.
Titulo: Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The reaction pathway containing the two hydrogen spill-over reactions is identified as the dominant pathway in the mechanism.
Titulo: Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Further analysis reveals that the hydrogen spill-over to oxide ion is the slowest reaction step with highest resistance and governs the rate of the over-all reaction.
Titulo: Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell
Topological analysis of hydrogen oxidation reaction kinetics at Ni/YSZ anode of the solid oxide fuel cell
